alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hardee, southeastern Manatee, northwestern DeSoto and north central Sarasota Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 221 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Myakka City, or 17 miles east of Sarasota, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myakka City, Myakka Head, and Lake Manatee State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
